name: The Maids in Vancouver
address: The Maids in Vancouver, 3993 Henning Dr #106, Burnaby, BC V5C 6P7

featured_reviews.review_id:
I've been using The Maids service for years on and off. They have never once let me down or ever provided less than excellent service.

The team that shows up is always very professional, personable and kind. And dealing with Bruce or the assistant managers is always a pleasure. They are extremely accommodating to any needs I may have. For instance, I have two kittens, who started off with poor health. Working with Bruce and the team we tried different schedules or breaks and approaches that created a minimal stress environment for the cats, which mean everything to me.

In general, I try to stay up to date on cleaning myself, but after years of degrading back pain, knowing I can rely on The Maids to pick up my slack and keep my apartment looking amazing is a huge relief.

I'm extremely grateful when I come across businesses that deliver above and beyond expectations.

Thank you for years of quality service
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steven , Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. We are so pleased to hear that our team had made your experience pleasant over the years and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: I booked The Maids for move out cleaning and they were on time, pleasant and most importantly did a fantastic cleaning job.  Thank you Bruce for helping organize the booking and Natasha and team for all your hard work.  I highly recommend The Maids.
featured_reviews.review_text: I booked The Maids for move out cleaning and they were on time, pleasant and most importantly did a fantastic cleaning job.  Thank you Bruce for helping organize the booking and Natasha and team for all your hard work.  I highly recommend The Maids.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Maria! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing The Maids for your move out cleaning. We're thrilled to hear that our team provided fantastic service, and we'll be sure to pass along your appreciation to Bruce, Natasha, and the rest of the team. We truly appreciate your recommendation!

featured_reviews.review_id: Natasha and her team do always an amazing cleaning job!     Our place sparkles afterwards - also due to their professionalism and warmth they bring to their visit.   I highly recommend the Maids.
featured_reviews.review_text: Natasha and her team do always an amazing cleaning job!     Our place sparkles afterwards - also due to their professionalism and warmth they bring to their visit.   I highly recommend the Maids.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Peter! Thank you so much for your kind words and 5-star rating! We're thrilled to hear that Natasha and our team consistently provide amazing cleaning services. We take pride in our professionalism and strive to bring warmth to every visit. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to serving you again!

featured_reviews.review_id: I was looking for a reliable cleaning service and I found the Maids of Vancouver. Excellent value and a hard working friendly team. I have a condo (2 bedroom). You just tell them what you want done and it's done. Steve H
featured_reviews.review_text: I was looking for a reliable cleaning service and I found the Maids of Vancouver. Excellent value and a hard working friendly team. I have a condo (2 bedroom). You just tell them what you want done and it's done. Steve H
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing Maids of Vancouver. We're thrilled to hear that our team provided you with excellent value and a friendly experience. We're always here to help make your condo shine, so don't hesitate to reach out anytime.

featured_reviews.review_id: I am really pleased with service from The Maids. Communication is great, they arrive with an energetic team and get to work. They bring all of their own supplies and equipment and do a very thorough clean in a short amount of time.
featured_reviews.review_text: I am really pleased with service from The Maids. Communication is great, they arrive with an energetic team and get to work. They bring all of their own supplies and equipment and do a very thorough clean in a short amount of time.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Heather , Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: I booked The Maids of Vancouver for a one time clean and was very happy with the service provided from booking to the cleaning team leaving. Bruce is very personable and detailed with his communication- I knew exactly what I was paying for. Every spot in the apartment was up to expectations and the equipment/products used were also of great quality. Additionally, because both my husband and I work from home, I was very happy that it only takes 45 minutes since they send a team of 4. Very great company to work with when you want consistent and efficient communication and quality of work! Looking forward to continuing using The Maids of Vancouver :)
featured_reviews.review_text: I booked The Maids of Vancouver for a one time clean and was very happy with the service provided from booking to the cleaning team leaving. Bruce is very personable and detailed with his communication- I knew exactly what I was paying for. Every spot in the apartment was up to expectations and the equipment/products used were also of great quality. Very great company to work with when you want consistent and efficient communication and quality of work! Looking forward to continuing using The Maids of Vancouver :)
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow Sanna! Thanks for taking time out of your day to review us and for the kind words. We'll be sure to share this with  the team as they'll be so pleased to hear how happy you are with the service. We truly appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: Really enjoyed the service I received through out the whole process. Bruce and Ana made me feel very valued as a customer and really responsive with emails and calls. The cleaning team arrived on time and were very polite, respectful and friendly. The clean was great and so fast! Signed up for a monthly service.
featured_reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed the service I received through out the whole process. Bruce and Ana made me feel very valued as a customer and really responsive with emails and calls. The cleaning team arrived on time and were very polite, respectful and friendly. The clean was great and so fast! Signed up for a monthly service.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to learn your experience was a positive one. We appreciate your business and thank you for signing up for recurring service. Looking forward to seeing you again next month.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I have used the Maids on various occasions and most recently for my move-in/ move-out cleaning. Tamanna and her team were responsible for the most recent jobs.  They were very professional, friendly, efficient, and showed up on time on both occasions.

In general, Bruce is always responsive, professional and  tries to accomodate my last minute requests. Keep up the great work!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the positive feedback. It means a lot. We will share this with the team!
